title: Three-wheeler fares to increase; Drivers to stop using meter, & negotiate fare with customer
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lanka’s three-wheeler drivers have decided to increase fares, following the Government’s decision to hike fuel prices.

Lalith Dharmasekara, the President of the All Island Three-Wheeler Drivers and Owners Association said tuk tuk drivers have been informed to temporarily stop metered rides and decide on charges per ride in a fair and just manner, without causing inconveniences to the public.
